meanings.sent1: The tricky riddle really flummoxed me.
meanings.sent2: The complex instructions can flummox even the smartest students.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve the math problem without any numbers flummoxed the entire class.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden change in behavior flummoxed her friends like a magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist in the movie completely flummoxed the audience.

meanings.sent1: She had a flummoxed expression on her face after hearing the surprising news.
meanings.sent2: The flummoxed look on his face showed he was lost in the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent3: The cat's flummoxed reaction to the disappearing toy was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The flummoxed tourists wandered around the maze-like streets of the old town.
meanings.sent5: His flummoxed mind felt like a tangled ball of yarn, unable to find a way out.
